bibl.title: Eupolis. Poet of Old Comedy.
bibl.note: Introduction. - The Fragments in Translation. - 1. Eupolis in Antiquity. - 2. Eupolis' Dates and Career. - 3. The Comedies of Eupolis [see in part. pp. 111-174: Demoi (Demes)]. - 4. The 'War' between the Poets. - 5. Eupolis and Comedy. - Appendices. Bibliography. Index.
STOREY Ian C., Eupolis. Poet of Old Comedy.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2003, 8°, xii-441 pp., 5 figg. ISBN 0-19-925992-5. £60.
